programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2133
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep977
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kongs elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Fight Back to School
programme.desc: The number one killer in SDU, Chow Sing Sing(Stephen Chow), is sent to a school to find a lost gun. His partner Tat(Ng Man Tat) pretends to be a school worker in assisting him. They recognize that some students are being closed with Fei, the head of triad society, and Fei traffics munitions. Sing steals and ignites Fei's munitions; Fei pledges to kill Sing...

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chefs delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: Corruption was rampant in the Hong Kong Police Force in the early 1970s. Chief Inspector Lak launders drug money with three other police officers, and a young officer from the newly established Independent Commission Against Corruption division is determined to bring them down.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the others parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: A high school student gets pregnant and is forced to have an abortion. When she dies from the operation, she returns as a ghost to haunt the apartment complex that she used to live

programme.title: Love isâ€¦Pyjamas
programme.desc: Underwear designer Spring and her daughter work at Hugos enterprise. Hugo demands a new fashion line design competition between Spring and the newly employed ex model Jojo to save his company from bankruptcy and the winner will take charge of the line. Who will win the competition and will Hugos enterprise be saved?

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about home and country is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the fathers forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the fighting spirit through generations.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yong Zhen moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich but ends up having to use his kung fu skills to survive and take revenge against the gang who killed his brother.

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the teams downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Chois actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: Disciples Of The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his fathers death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: The lovely Michelle Mei Suet plays a spoiled girl Szu-szu who ignores her true love Yang Fan to go off in search of a swordsman Chin Ko she idolizes. The search sets off one great action scene after another, until she's threatened to be sold into slavery but Yang Fan arrives in the nick of time! This amusing and entertaining variation on the standard kung-fu film is definitely a winner.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sings wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: Gang Master
programme.desc: This is a story about an army out to destroy the Hsien Lung gang of anti-Yuan revolutionaries. Their leader Ru Yi Tu is up against Fu Zhong Yuan, the identified successor of the Hsien Lung gang who must also prove his own legitimacy. The plot thickens with murder, sibling rivalry and shocking discoveries that could change the course of history.

programme.title: Let'S Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fianc, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.title: Usurpers Of Emperor'S Power
programme.desc: The last ruler of Tang, Li Yao is deposed by Chao Kuang-jun, the founder of the Sung Dynasty. Unfortunately his actions unleash a new plague - his brother Kuang-yi - on the courts and his people. The marauding Kuang-yi rapes and plunders. As more people get involved, it turns into a bloody battlefield of betrayal. It is up to upright officials like Li Lang to put an end to it. But can one man take on the imperial army?

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professors assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: Challenge Of The Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, who was also his fathers martial arts teacher. Although he is defeated in a competition, Wong Fei Hungs passion in Kung Fu finally moves Lu and allows him to become Lus disciple.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Flag Of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Five Superfighters
programme.desc: A kung fu master and his three students lost everything after they are floored by a bully. To take revenge, the students find ways to learn from other kung fu masters and come back six months later to have a rematch with the bully on their masters birthday.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: In this horror anthology an old man dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a mortician's ghost goes on the rampage.

programme.title: House Of Traps
programme.desc: It all started with THE FIVE VENOMS, the internationally loved kung-fu thriller which introduced director Chang Cheh's recurring cast of martial arts masters. It continued through more than a dozen high-flying, bloody good entertainments featuring the same action actors in pairs, trios, quartets, and, most memorably, quintets. While this is considered the last official "Venoms" movie, what a film it is. The title does not lie: an evil prince has secreted stolen imperial treasures in a building that practically bristles with booby-trapped blades. Bodies are pierced, limbs are cut off, and there's one plasma-spurting attack after another as heroes and rogues alike try to solve the secrets of the hell house. The core Venoms themselves choreograph the gory fun in this fond farewell to their worldwide film series sensation.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandmas pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chiefs daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all

programme.title: The Blue And The Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Lion Vs Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques. The Five Venom alumnus and Chang Cheh discovery, Lo Meng, teams up with Liu Chia-liang protege Wang Yu, as they inadvertently turn from vagabond kung-fu school operators into anti-Ching, patriotic fighters.

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: The Emperor And His Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlongs younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Kirumi
programme.desc: Tamil Action Thriller Movie, Starring, Kathir, Reshmi Menon, Charle & Others. Kathir, a carefree young man, becomes a police informer like his neighbour Prabhakar, and begins to get too close with inspector Soundarapandian, despite the warnings of the latter. It is only when he tries to ride on an ego clash between Soundarapandian and Mathiarasu, a rival inspector, that he realizes he's become a pawn in a dangerous game

programme.desc: Roof / River - Beavis and Butt-Head get stuck on top of Tom Anderson's house./ Beavis and Butt-Head go tubing on a river and end up lost at sea.

programme.title: Children of a Lesser God
programme.desc: Based on the hit Broadway play, it's the uplifting love story of John Leeds, an idealistic special education teacher, and a headstrong deaf girl named Sarah.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 04
programme.desc: When Sheldon won't tell anyone why he's never mentioned Tam (ROBERT WU), his childhood best friend, Leonard takes matters into his own hands.JERRY O'CONNELL guest stars.

programme.title: Music And Lyrics
programme.desc: Hugh Grant and Drew Barrymore star as washed-up '80s pop star with a chance for a comeback and his quirky plant lady with a knack for lyrics. Alex Fletcher (Grant--Two Weeks Notice) has been reduced to working the nostalgia circuit at county fairs and amusement parks. The charismatic and talented musician gets a chance at a comeback when reigning pop diva Cora Corman (Haley Bennett) invites him to write and record a duet with her, but there's a problem--Alex hasn't written a song in years; he's never written lyrics . . . and he has to come up with a hit in a matter of days. Enter Sophie Fisher (Barrymore--Lucky You), Alex's beguilingly plant lady, whose flair for words strikes a chord with the struggling songwriter. On the rebound from a bad relationship with the newly famous novelist Sloan Cates (Campbell Scott--Duma), Sophie is reluctant to collaborate with anyone, especially commitment-phobe Alex. Now, Alex and Sophie will have to face their fears--and the music--to find the love and success they both deserve. Written and directed by Marc Lawrence, the writer of the Miss Congeniality films and the writer/director of Two Weeks Notice.

programme.title: Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close
programme.desc: An inventive eleven year-old New Yorkers discovery of a key in his deceased father's belongings sets him off on an urgent search across the city for the lock it will open.

programme.title: Hall Pass
programme.desc: Rick and Fred are best friends who have each been married for many years. When the two men begin to show signs of restlessness at home, their wives granting them a "hall pass," one week of freedom to do whatever they want...

programme.title: Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Valerie is a beautiful young woman torn between two men. She is in love with a brooding outsider Peter, but her parents have arranged for her to marry the wealthy Henry. Unwilling to lose each other, Valerie and Peter are planning to run away together when they learn that Valerie's older sister has been killed by the werewolf that prowls the dark forest surrounding their village. Father Solomon, a famous werewolf hunter, warns that the wolf, who takes human form by day, could be any one of them. As the death toll rises with each moon, Valerie begins to suspect that the werewolf could be someone she loves. Panic grips the town as Valerie discovers that she has a unique connection to the beast.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: As a young boy, Bruce Wayne watched in horror as his millionaire parents were slain in front of him a trauma that leads him to become obsessed with revenge. But the opportunity to avenge his parents' deaths is cruelly taken away from him by fate. Fleeing to the East, where he seeks counsel with the dangerous but honorable ninja cult leader known as Ra's Al-Ghul, Bruce returns to his now decaying Gotham City, which is overrun by organized crime and other dangerous individuals manipulating the system. Meanwhile, Bruce is slowly being swindled out of Wayne Industries, the company he inherited. The discovery of a cave under his mansion, along with a prototype armored suit, leads him to assume a new persona, one which will strike fear into the hearts of men who do wrong; he becomes Batman!!!

programme.title: Grudge Match
programme.desc: Oscar winner Robert De Niro (Raging Bull, Silver Linings Playbook) and Oscar nominee Sylvester Stallone (the Rocky films, The Expendables) play Billy The Kid McDonnen and Henry Razor Sharp, two local Pittsburgh fighters whose fierce rivalry put them in the national spotlight. Each had scored a victory against the other during their heyday, but in 1983, on the eve of their decisive third match, Razor suddenly announced his retirement, refusing to explain why but effectively delivering a knock-out punch to both their careers. Thirty years later, boxing promoter Dante Slate Jr., seeing big dollar signs, makes them an offer they cant refuse: to re-enter the ring and settle the score once and for all.

programme.title: Friends S9 14

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: The Wolf of Wall Street's Jonah Hill and Whiplash's Miles Teller star in this dramedy based on a true story that follows two twenty-something Miami stoners who exploit a little-known government initiative during the Iraq War that allows small businesses to bid on U.S. Military contracts. Starting small, they begin raking in big money and are soon living the high life. But the pair gets in over their heads when they land a $300 million deal to arm the Afghan Military -- a deal that puts them in business with some very shady people, not the least of which turns out to be the U.S. Government. Comedy powerhouse Todd Phillips (The Hangover films) writes, directs and produces (with Bradley Cooper) this incredible true story based on a controversial Rolling Stone article.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The Sea
programme.desc: Oscar winner Ron Howard (A Beautiful Mind) directs the action adventure based on the best-selling book about the dramatic true journey of the whaling ship Essex. In the winter of 1820, the New England whaling vessel Essex was assaulted by something no one could believe: a whale of mammoth size and will, and an almost human sense of vengeance. The real-life maritime disaster would inspire Herman Melville's Moby Dick. But that told only half the story. In The Heart of The Sea reveals the encounter's harrowing aftermath, as the ship's surviving crew is pushed to their limits and forced to do the unthinkable to stay alive. Braving storms, starvation, panic and despair, the men will call into question their deepest beliefs, from the value of their lives to the morality of their trade, as their captain searches for direction on the open sea and his first mate (The Avengers' Chris Hemsworth) still seeks to bring the great whale down.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 10
programme.desc: Michael schools a man on fish fossil breeding at a rock store and colors with his tongue at a paint store. Then, on a construction site, Michael and his helper dig up a skeleton that still has some life in it.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 23
programme.desc: Q, Murr, Joe and Sal get drenched at a water park, then play a wild round of TP basketball at the grocery store. Plus, the loser strikes out while jockeying for a ball from New York Mets pitcher Noah Syndergaard.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 05
programme.desc: Sheldon sabotages Amy's career and gets a ghostly visit from an old friend; Meanwhile Raj refused Howard's offer to co-host a planetarium show.

programme.title: Friends S9 15
programme.desc: Joey develops an unusual acting method in order to impress a famous, pompous fellow actor, Leonard, during an audition for an important stage role.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 1
programme.desc: The bidders are back and the competition is fiercer than ever! Mo & Ty set their sights on a container from Mexico, but could everything inside be damaged goods? The Israelis pin their hopes on a mysterious wooden crate, and bids go through the roof on a one-of-a-kind open-air container.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 2
programme.desc: Mo and the Israelis partner up on a container from Africa, but will their alliance result in fool's gold? Matt attacks the competition for a can full of Chinese goods, but it could blow up in his face. And later, things take a bizarre turn when a bunch of strange items from an odd collector spark an intense bidding war

programme.title: East New York S1 4
programme.desc: The team gets creative to defuse a family conflict, and Haywood considers connecting with her estranged father.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 3
programme.desc: Competition boils over when bitter rivals Brandon and Jesse throw down over a storage unit containing an amazing movie monster and a potential hundred thousand dollar payout. Security steps in, but can they separate the boys before the blood hits thefloor?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 4
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori look to cash in on their first big trip to New Orleans, but the locals are hungering for a fight. Then, the Taylor Brothers wage war to win a locker loaded with hunting and sporting equipment. What no one knows is that hidden beneaththe fishing poles, bear traps and camping gear is the score of a lifetime. And later, fireworks explode when a locker full of liquor and rare Mardi Gras masks spark a do or die bidding war.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 4
programme.desc: Lois interrupts an intense conversation between Clark and John Henry. Kyle tries to run interference between Sarah and Lana. Jonathan has a heated discussion with Candices dad.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 4
programme.desc: Bidders go head to head in a battle over some super heavyweight freight, a can filled to the brim with outdoor adventure equipment contains a unique surprise, and a tailgaters dream could stop its winner short of the goal line.

programme.desc: Back on the bayou, the buyers are ready to crack open the abandoned lockers and throw down some serious cash. Local legend FJ sees big dollar signs in old voodoo artifacts. Brandon and Lori unearth a rare find with a potentially priceless payout. Andall bets are off when a bidding war over endangered species taxidermy ends in a heated stand-off with the local authorities.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 6
programme.desc: The buyers press their luck in Sin City where Brandon and Lori get outfoxed by a group of locals with a questionable strategy. Then, Jesse gambles on a locker filled with junk. Everyone thinks he's crazy, but he knows something they don't. And later,vintage slot machines and poker tables send bidding through the roof. The closing price is stratospheric, but what's hidden from sight will be the ultimate payday for one lucky Storage Hunter.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 11
programme.desc: Michael feeds a cannibalistic plant at a garden center, and at the tuxedo store, he sells a tie that literally suits itself. Plus, at a hockey rink, Michael's assistant is speechless with a trick so electric it melts the ice!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 24
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q and Murr dodge shakedowns with the help of some strangers, then get handsy in a parking lot. A clip bait battle goes down in the park, and the loser has a run-in at a party that leaves him down for the count.

programme.title: A Man Apart
programme.desc: Sean Vetter and Demetrius Hicks are a pair of DEA agents who think they've made the bust of a lifetime when they capture 'Memo' Lucero, a multi-millionaire drug lord who controlled most of the narcotics traffic along the border of Mexico and the United States. However, with Lucero behind bars, a new and decidedly more dangerous underworld kingpin rises to take his place, and Diablo, soon proves to be even more dangerous than Lucero when he orders his gunmen to assassinate Vetter. While Vetter escapes unharmed, his wife is killed, and Vetter is thrown deep into despair. Now Vetter is obsessed with bringing Diablo to justice, and he's willing to do anything to bring him down - even if it means teaming up with Lucero.

programme.title: Flags Of Our Fathers
programme.desc: Filmmaking legends Steven Spielberg and Clint Eastwood team up for the first time to tell the unforgettable story of the grueling World War II battle for the island of Iwo Jima -- a turning point in the war for control over the Pacific. The battle produced one of the war's most enduring images: a photograph of six U.S. Marines raising an American flag on the top of Mt. Suribachi. Multiple Academy Award winner Eastwood directs a powerful all-star ensemble including Paul Walker, Ryan Phillippe, Adam Beach, Jamie Bell, Barry Pepper, Neal McDonough and more in this tragic depiction of an epic struggle that would cost the lives of thousands of Japanese and American soldiers.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S11 Ep35
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep1
programme.desc: Pilot - Professor of behavioral science Alec Mercer is called upon to investigate the murder of a fashion influencer whose boyfriend, a decorated soldier and son of a Senator, has confessed to the crime. Mercer suspects there is more to the story than meets the eye.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep2
programme.desc: Dead Woman Walking - Alec is approached by his old friend CJ, a prominent investigative journalist, who asks for his help after she is poisoned with rare and deadly nerve agent. With time running out, Mercer pieces together scant clues.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep3
programme.desc: The Barnum Effect - After a passenger plane crashes into the Potomac, suspicions focus immediately on the pilot. Alec and the team are asked to investigate the pilots personal motivations and piece together clues in the hopes of revealing the truth.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep4
programme.desc: Zero Sum - Alec and the team take on a kidnapping case at the request of a desperate father. Their investigation is hampered by a complicated family dynamic that slowly reveals everyones hidden motivations.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky Charms - Alec and the team head to Las Vegas to help Camille, a former colleague turned expert poker player whos been lured into danger. They must take some risks to solve a gambling mystery before Camille gets hurt. Marisa makes a significant discovery.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Welcome to Hotel Transylvania, Draculas lavish five-stake resort, where monsters and their families can live it up and no humans are allowed.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep19
programme.desc: The Long Sleep - A disoriented man hires Magnum and Higgins to investigate a crime he doesnt remember after he woke up on the beach covered in blood.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep20
programme.desc: Close to Home - Magnum and Higgins take on a dangerous mission inside a high-security correctional center when a ruthless criminal abducts Katsumotos ex-wife, Beth.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S5 Ep1
programme.desc: The Passenger - Magnum and Higgins weigh the risks of pursuing a relationship. Rick juggles being a new father and running La Mariana. Katsumoto tries to figure out his next move.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Top 50 - Round 1 - Australia's top 50 junior cooks enter The Dome to take part in the biggest challenge in MasterChef history!

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Top 50 - Round 2 - There are 2 heats to secure another 8 positions in the Junior MasterChef top 20. The 1st heat sees the kids cooking fast food with a healthy twist. The 2nd heat has the kids very excited - it's an ice cream challenge!

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Top 50 - Round 3 - Our top 50 young cooks face two last challenges to earn a place in the legendary MasterChef kitchen.

programme.desc: 30 Rock - Pilot - Head writer Liz Lemon finds herself defending her live TV show when brash new network executive Jack Donaghy (Alec Baldwin) starts meddling.

programme.desc: Blood In The Water - As the NCIS team searches for Gibbs after wreckage from his boat is discovered, they find out he was tracking a serial killer with journalist Marcie Warren (Pam Dawber), who wrote an expos on him

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep2
programme.desc: Nearly Departed - While trying to find the serial killer Gibbs was after, the NCIS team discovers another person has been tracking the case as well

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep3
programme.desc: Road To Nowhere - Gibbs and Parker go on a road trip to find one of the serial killers victims. Also, Agent Knight goes undercover at a large manufacturing company with ties to the murders

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep4
programme.desc: Great Wide Open - Gibbs and McGee head to Alaska while the team works at home to uncover the conspiracy behind the serial killer

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep5
programme.desc: Face The Strange - The NCIS team investigates the death of a Navy commander whose body suddenly explodes before Jimmy can examine it

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Do You Have What It Bakes? - Ten home bakers dive into the wonderful world of chocolate and must tackle the art of table tempering. Creativity runs wild as the home bakers create a chocolate dessert based on an animal that best represents them.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Where There's A Whisk, There's A Way - The nine home bakers use chocolate to create playful and delicious vessels to hold their desserts in their Technique Test.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep3
programme.desc: It's Time To Glaze The Bar - The eight home bakers make a solar system cake for their technique test.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Moved To Tiers - Sweet safety is on the line for the seven remaining home bakers. In the Technique Test, the bakers learn how to incorporate a rainbow of color into their desserts and create edible works of art.

programme.title: Peacock
programme.desc: A bank clerk leading a seemingly uneventful life in a quiet little town finds his life suddenly changed after a local train accident threatens to reveal his biggest secret.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

programme.desc: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

programme.title: The Exorcism Of Emily Rose
programme.desc: A lawyer takes on the negligent homicide case of a priest who performed an exorcism on a college student.

programme.title: A Single Shot
programme.desc: A single shot, aimed at a lone deer, hits and kills a young woman. Hunter John Moon watches the young woman die before discovering a box of money near her body. In a desperate panic, he takes the cash and attempts to cover up the killing.

programme.title: The Shepherd

programme.desc: The Electric Car - Hannah Fry discovers why innovations in meat packing almost derailed the electric car revolution and how a breakthrough in camcorder batteries led to Elon Musk's electric empire.

programme.desc: Food for Tots is tasked with preparing 10,000 fresh and healthy lunches for 400 hundred childcare centres across the Toronto area. Homestyle Deserts has to work through the night on carrot cakes.

programme.desc: A squad of Ohio taco artists is determined to win an annual food truck competition.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Patterned Planet - Cameras in space capture natural spectacles on an epic scale.

programme.title: Secrets of the Jurassic Dinosaurs S1 Ep2
programme.desc: This time the team tries to figure out if the Jurassic's most vicious predator was involved in the deaths of super-sized beasts like the iconic Diplodocus which are buried at the site, helping to reveal why so many dinosaurs came here, and what killed them in such great numbers 150 million years ago.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Zambezi - Follow the journey of the mighty Zambezi - Africa's wildest river. It floods across endless plains, fuelling the migration of 30,000 wildebeest, turning villages into islands accessible only by boat.

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sue Perkins enjoys a night out with Kyoto's geishas, goes free diving with some ama divers and visits Hiroshima. In Tokyo, she explores how the Japanese are tackling the future.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Ridge of Fire Part 1 - An inconspicuous hill on the Spanish Island of La Palma bursts open, releasing an avalanche of lava. programme.title: Wild Scandinavia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Fire and Ice - Scandinavia's extremes are kingdoms of ice and fire. Awake under the long polar night, Muskoxen, polar bears, and arctic foxes must navigate the dramatic transformation of their world as it melts into a sleepless rush of life under the midnight sun.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Suffolk - Kate walks 12 miles of Suffolk's shingle coast, starting at Minsmere Nature Reserve, before heading along the pebble beach past Sizewell B power station.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S5 Ep3
programme.desc: Shark vs Barracuda - In central Africa, Cyril must remain on high alert, especially from his small tippy dugout. In order to find the elusive giant Barracuda he's after, a 100 lb and six foot torpedo, he will have to venture very far into a hostile jungle and fish watersteeming with Bull Sharks.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S10 Ep7
programme.desc: Burdens of Winter - As the Arctic summer turns to fall and temperatures begin their decline, Alaskan ingenuity assists in securing materials for the coming freeze. To prepare for the winter ahead, bush-dwellers brave dangerous encounters with hungry predators.

programme.desc: Fire and Ice - Scandinavia's extremes are kingdoms of ice and fire. Awake under the long polar night, Muskoxen, polar bears, and arctic foxes must navigate the dramatic transformation of their world as it melts into a sleepless rush of life under the midnight sun.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Suffolk - Kate walks 12 miles of Suffolk's shingle coast, starting at Minsmere Nature Reserve, before heading along the pebble beach past Sizewell B power station.

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sue Perkins enjoys a night out with Kyoto's geishas, goes free diving with some ama divers and visits Hiroshima. In Tokyo, she explores how the Japanese are tackling the future.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S5 Ep3
programme.desc: Shark vs Barracuda - In central Africa, Cyril must remain on high alert, especially from his small tippy dugout. In order to find the elusive giant Barracuda he's after, a 100 lb and six foot torpedo, he will have to venture very far into a hostile jungle and fish watersteeming with Bull Sharks.

programme.desc: A Louisiana fishing boat faces mechanical breakdowns and a Toronto catering company struggles to prepare thousands of meals for travellers.

programme.desc: Food Factory serves up chocolate pizza, crispy jalapeno poppers, a thirst-quenching pilsner, and a sweet chipotle chili.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep2
programme.desc: Food Factory goes trick-or-treating for candy corn, booger lollipops, spooktacular gummies, and hand-frosted jack'o'lantern cookies.

programme.title: The Mating Game S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Oceans: Out Of The Blue - The Ocean is where life first experimented with the Mating Game, and over time this has led to some of the most ingenious mating strategies of all!

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tuscany - Stanley Tucci returns to Tuscany, his former home, alongside his parents Stan and Joan. Tuscany is the birthplace of the Renaissance and world-class art, architecture and culture.

programme.title: Fearless 48 Hours S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Maya Jama - Jason Fox - Foxy from SAS: Who Dares Wins - takes Maya Jama out of her comfort zone for scary physical challenges and some heart-to-heart chat.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S10 Ep8
programme.desc: Hard Lessons, Lasting Impressions - Alaskans break trail and hunt for their survival during the tail end of the brutal winter.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Capybara's Pond Ep7
programme.desc: At the northern edge of the Pantanal, in one of the largest tropical wetlands on Earth, is a small pond that is home to an unusual family of rodents. They are not your typical rats or squirrels - these giants are the size of sheep! And in the middle of the dry season, this group has more than a dozen babies to raise and keep safe. It is a challenge because as big as they are, these gentle giants are on the menu of lots of predators.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 - Squirrel Monkey Island Ep2
programme.desc: Travel deep into the Columbian rainforest, where its mating season for one of the most clever monkey species in the world. Witness the most important time of year for male squirrel monkeys that have been bulking up to impress females for months.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - The Clean Up Crew Ep1
programme.desc: Every day a struggle for survival plays out across Africa. Predators binge on the dead and natures undertakers circle above waiting for their chance. When the mighty fall, an army descends to devour what others leave behind for they too must nurture their precious families.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Fantastic Frogs Ep2
programme.desc: Their ancestors were the first vertebrates to colonise dry land and they inhabit every continent except Antarctica, but their world is rapidly changing. Twenty species call this city home but what was once wetlands are now playgrounds, golf courses and race tracks. This is the land to which they cling. Around the world frog populations are in decline and time is running out.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Back from the Dead Ep8
programme.desc: Sometimes animals get a second chance. Like the majestic elk, which went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and over-aggressive hunting. But a few years ago, hundreds of elk were brought back, to re-populate the province in four different areas. Some floundered because of new, aggressive local predators. But a colony of elk in Burwash, on a former prison ground, is thriving.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Cocos Island Ep1
programme.desc: Dubbed "the most beautiful island in the world" by Jacques Cousteau, Cocos Island is a gem among Costa Ricas national parks. Aboard the Undersea Hunter, well explore the areas hammerhead and Galapagos sharks, rays, and other large marine species that populate these deep waters.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Addo Elephant Ep1
programme.desc: The Addo Elephant National Park sits in the heart of the Eastern Cape of South Africa, covering over 1600 square kilometres of land. While the elephants are the stars of the park, Addo is the only reserve in the world where visitors can see all of the big seven: lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo, white rhino, southern right whale, and great white shark.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Enjoy the spring baby boom at the center as the staff go gaga over an adorable bundle of baby possums. Then see the rescue team hit a rooftop patio for a little R and R: retrieving and rescuing a mama and her ducklings perched high above the city.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Mother's Darlings Ep2
programme.desc: Not all infants in the animal kingdom get to have a good mother. But these are the stories of the lucky ones, from a ring-tailed lemur who learns everything from its mom to a tiny orangutan that receives a constant supply of motherly cuddles.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Socorro Islands Ep2
programme.desc: A wild and remote chain 400 kilometres south of Cabo San Lucas in the eastern Pacific, the Socorro Islands have been called the Mexican Galapagos. They're known for jaw-dropping encounters with giant Pacific manta rays, hammerhead schools, dolphins, and tiger sharks.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Table Mountain Ep2
programme.desc: Table Mountain National Park on the southwestern tip of Africa is a park surrounded by ocean and humanity. It is a rugged peninsula jutting out into the cold Atlantic Ocean and forming an island of incredible diversity.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Rheas-Cerrado Ep8
programme.desc: Every year in the dry season, as the floodwaters disappear, the grasslands of the Pantanal are home to many species: giant anteaters, maned wolves and the greater rheas- the largest bird in South America.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 - Realm of the Spectacled Bear Ep3
programme.desc: Get to know South Americas only bear species. Witness the shy and charismatic spectacled bear play, forage, and look for mates at the secluded Chaparri Ecological Reserve in Northern Peru.

programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the centers release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things dont go exactly as planned.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - The More the Merrier Ep3
programme.desc: Watch fur seals give birth by the thousands, black bear cubs wrestle with their buddies, and meerkat pups forge bonds by sharing choresall proving that growing up in the animal kingdom is easier when you have numbers on your side.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Bahamas Ep3
programme.desc: The islands of the Bahamas are ringed with lush coral, underground cave systems, and plunging barrier reefs. Beyond the white sands and turquoise water, marine life abounds: agile reef sharks, large whitetip sharks, manatees, sea turtles, and wild dolphins.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - iSimangoliso Ep3
programme.desc: In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as the Miracle, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Giant Otter Refuge Ep9
programme.desc: At the southern edge of the Pantanal, in one of the worlds largest tropical wetlands, Biologist Carolina Ribas and her local guide, Arilei Terena search for a giant otter den. Despite their large size, noisy and gregarious nature, endangered giant otters are notoriously shy and hard to find.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Tsiba's New Mum Ep4
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelopes tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.desc: Baby Steel / Joke's On You - When Steel accidentally turns himself into a baby, he wreaks havoc on Platinum City. // It's the annual "Day of Fun"! However when Ricardo and Trickalien play the ultimate prank on the Deer Squad, the day of fun soon turns into a day of chaos!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Paddingtons Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist - Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Pups Save the Paw Patroller - When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the PAW Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep522
programme.desc: Pups Rescue Thanksgiving / Pups Save a Windy Bay - The bouncy turkey from the Thanksgiving feast at City Hall has flown away with Humdinger and his kittens! // A super-strong wind has suddenly swept up all the surfers in the Adventure Bay Windsurfing Race.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Turtle's Shell Day / The Way of the Gran-Gran / The Spring Kick-off Games - Bossy plans a Shell Day party for Turtle without considering what Turtle wants. // Bossy and Turtle learn how to be patient from the Master. // Gran-Gran; Bossy is tired of losing at the Spring Kickoff Games.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep204
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark - Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep104
programme.desc: The Magic Spyglass / The Stone of Life - Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase. / Santi and crew follow a map to a special treasure, but Bonnie and Sir Butterscotch are hot on their trail.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Blaze of Glory - Blaze and his driver AJ are introduced to a world of racing Monster Machines. But when a truck named Crusher uses dirty tricks to try and win the Championship Race, Blaze will do everything to help his friends and beat Crusher to the finish line.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep512
programme.desc: The Mechanic Team! - Blaze stops into Gabby's Garage for a quick repair - just as she gets an alert! Three far-flung trucks need her mechanical know-how! So, Blaze and AJ volunteer to help her take her garage on the go!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep513
programme.desc: The Big Balloon Rescue - All of Axle City is enjoying the Balloon Fair - until Crusher and Pickle get stuck on a runaway hot-air balloon! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to rescue their high-flying friends... before they crash into the Slime Volcano!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep604
programme.desc: Pups Save the Honey / Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse - Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! // Mayor Goodway's purse has disappeared! Along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep86
programme.desc: This Way, That Way - The Teletubbies go 'this way, that way' on a Tubby Car journey to the Hidey Hup. The Tubby Spinny goes 'this way, that way' too.

programme.title: Laporan Khas: U-Turn; Penjara & PhD (New)
programme.desc: Laporan Khas ini membawa cerita berkenaan 'Zaki' (bukan nama sebenar) yang dimasukkan ke penjara atas kesalahan membunuh pada usia 14 tahun. Kini berusia dalam lingkungan 40-an, beliau bukan sekadar berdamai dengan takdir di balik tirai besi, malah cuba untuk mengubah hidup melalui pendidikan.Bermula dengan mengambil Sijil Pelajaran Malaysia (SPM), beliau kini merupakan satu-satunya banduan di Malaysia yang sedang mengikuti Program Pengajian Doktor Falsafah di sebuah Institusi Pengajian Tinggi tempatan.

programme.desc: Selatan Thai untuk memaparkan lokasi menarik lagi unik supaya ia dapat dirancang pelancong Malaysia sebagai itinerari lawatan bila berkunjung ke Negara Thai. programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Three years after Brexit and Britain is broken. The country's cost of living crisis is now fuelling separatist movements. In Wales where one in three children live in poverty, the call for independence is getting louder.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Food Trail Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Luke explores and reminisces about his childhood growing up in Cabramatta, in Western Sydney. He meets with his high school friend Thai to cook a Vietnamese Curry, then takes us behind the scenes at his Sydney restaurant.

programme.title: Heywire Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Heywire winner and cricket sensation Abby is developing the game for other up and coming girls living in rural and regional Australia.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Australia's great untold spy story. A senior officer at our national spy agency stole and sold highly classified intelligence to Russia's KGB for at least six years, jeopardising our security relationship with the US and UK.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Back Roads visits Cunnamulla in south-west Queensland with guest presenter, 24-year-old Yorta Yorta man and TikTok star Tom Forrest aka 'Outback Tom'. He finds a town transforming itself from a dark past to a brighter future.

programme.title: The Homes That Built Australia Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Our resilience as a society continues to be tested - from the recession of the early '90s right through to the COVID-19 Pandemic, the need for a stable and secure sense of home becomes impossible to deny. (Final)

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - James and Helen Knight's new house design isn't the norm. Set high on a ridge overlooking the undulating hills of Adelaide's Barossa Valley, the success of this logical and simple design relies on perfection in the detail.

programme.desc: Lifestyle Europe

programme.desc: Secrets of the Stone Age, Part 2: Witnesses for Eternity - Around 12,000 years ago, humans underwent a transition from the mobile lifestyle of hunter-gatherers to the settled life of farmers. That epoch, the Stone Age, produced monumental building works. How did our ancestors live and build back then? Part 2 of this two-part documentary takes us to unique archaeological sites in Scotland, Brittany, Austria, Malta, Turkey and Jordan.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition 2023
programme.desc: This episode shows how advances in technology and warehouse design are helping to increase efficiency and lessen the amount of space needed in the logistics industry.

programme.title: National Parks Of Japan:Akan-Mashu
programme.desc: Akan-Mashu National Park is home to Lake Akan, Lake Kussharo, and Lake Mashu. It provides unique winter sights and the opportunity to experience the indigenous Ainu culture.

programme.title: Spiritual Explorers
programme.desc: The Kishiwada Danjiri is a 250-year-old festival in which 200 people pull a 4-ton cart at top speed through the streets. Explore the spirituality behind this audacious ritual.

programme.title: Framing Everyday Moments
programme.desc: A unique time-lapse photography project. Shot by pros and non-pros from around the world, on the transience of nature, celestial phenomena, cityscapes and each single moment of everyday life.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: Snow piles up in winter along the sea of Japan. Visit a morning seafood market, play in the snow, admire traditional lacquerware, and enjoy warm mochi rice cake with cute kitties.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Oda Yuriko has a disease which affects her muscles. She runs an app that offers fellow wheelchair users information about accessibility in the hopes of creating a world that works for everyone.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Canadian Dave Enright who works as a backcountry skiing guide and safety expert in mountainous Nagano, as well as Nepalese Ramala Ghimire who manages a public bath in Hakone, Kanagawa.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: My Street Piano

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Have you ever had a meal you'll never forget? We asked people with international roots living in Japan to tell us about the flavors that will forever remain in their hearts.

programme.desc: This time we introduce "Special series of Saitama in November." We present attractive points of Saitama by showing "Where We Call Home," "Small Journeys," and some other programs.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Kaizoku: Seto Inland Sea
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Seto Inland Sea.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Spiritual Explorers
programme.desc: The Kishiwada Danjiri is a 250-year-old festival in which 200 people pull a 4-ton cart at top speed through the streets. Explore the spirituality behind this audacious ritual.

programme.title: Framing Everyday Moments
programme.desc: A unique time-lapse photography project. Shot by pros and non-pros from around the world, on the transience of nature, celestial phenomena, cityscapes and each single moment of everyday life.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition 2023
programme.desc: This episode shows why one businesses is turning bamboo into livestock feed and how another came up with the idea to make tinder from towel lint.

programme.title: National Parks Of Japan:Akan-Mashu
programme.desc: Akan-Mashu National Park is home to Lake Akan, Lake Kussharo, and Lake Mashu. It provides unique winter sights and the opportunity to experience the indigenous Ainu culture.

programme.title: Journeys In Japan
programme.desc: 19th-century British diplomat E. Satow (Alfie Goodrich) visits Tochigi Pref. in search of rest and recreation. On this program, get to know the real Japan and discover useful travel tips.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: On The Wings 5Min.
programme.desc: Join us on a night flight to admire Japan's stunning views on a journey from Tokyo to Fukuoka. Behold the sublime beauty of Mt. Fuji at sunset and the sparkling night views of major cities.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Miwa Kaito uses information and communications technology to help children in poverty around the world who lack access to adequate schooling. He shares his vision for providing educational support.

programme.title: Dining With The Chef
programme.desc: Chef Saito's authentic recipes: (1) White Miso Ozoni (2) Isobeyaki with Sweet and Savory Butter Sauce. Learn about Japanese home cooking, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Ramen Japan
programme.desc: In the birthplace of tonkotsu ramen, we visit a long-standing shop specializing in the Kurume style. Learn the surprising story of this cloudy pork-bone broth ramen from those who love it best.

programme.title: Framing Everyday Moments
programme.desc: A unique time-lapse photography project. Shot by pros and non-pros from around the world, on the transience of nature, celestial phenomena, cityscapes and each single moment of everyday life.

programme.title: Document 72 Hours
programme.desc: A railway running through a remote and snowy part of Aomori, northern Japan, is a lifeline for locals. For 3 days in midwinter, we hopped on board and asked passengers what this train means to them.

programme.title: People And Profit
programme.desc: People and Profit presents top business stories, analyses latest trends and explains what and how impact business operations. Find out what the business prospects are, how business and economic situation affect each and everyone.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC281AdesanyavsPereira
programme.desc: Two titles were on the line at UFC 281 as middleweight champion Israel Adesanya faced former foe Alex Pereira. Plus, Carla Esparza had her first title defense against former champion Zhang Weili. See the entire main card, and more, of UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep906EdwardsvsDiaz
programme.desc: Fan favorite Nate Diaz returned to action taking on surging welterweight contender Leon Rocky Edwards at UFC 263. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their battle in front of a packed house in Glendale, Arizona.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC282BlachowiczvsAnkalaev
programme.desc: At UFC 282, Former champion Jan Blachowicz fought for the vacant light heavyweight title against surging contender Magomed Ankalaev. Plus, Paddy The Baddy Pimblett took on Jared Gordon. See the entire main card, and more, of UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep10
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep24
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep7
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1002UsmanvsCovington2
programme.desc: UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2342
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds
